data.enText: thrust
thrust
to push sth/sb suddenly or violently in a particular direction; to move quickly and suddenly in a particular direction
data.chText: 猛推；冲；搡；挤；塞

data.enText: He thrust the baby into my arms and ran off.
data.chText: 他把婴儿往我怀里一塞就跑了。

data.enText: She thrust her hands deep into her pockets.
data.chText: 她把双手深深插进口袋里。

data.enText: He tends to thrust himself forward too much.
data.chText: 他这个人太好强。

data.enText: She thrust past him angrily and left.
data.chText: 她气呼呼地从他身旁挤过去走了。

data.enText: to make a sudden strong forward movement at sb with a weapon, etc.
data.chText: 刺；戳

data.enText: He thrust at me with a knife.
data.chText: 他拿刀向我刺来。

data.enText: a thrusting movement
data.chText: 冲刺动作

data.enText: force/thrust/ram sth down sb's throat
to try to force sb to listen to and accept your opinions in a way that they find annoying
data.chText: 强加于人；强迫接受（观点）

data.enText: thrust sth↔aside
to refuse to listen to sb's complaints, comments, etc.
data.chText: 置之一旁；置之不理

data.enText: All our objections were thrust aside.
data.chText: 我们所有的异议都被置之不理。

data.enText: thrust sth/sb on/upon sb
to force sb to accept or deal with sth/sb that they do not want
data.chText: 把…强加于；强迫…接受；强人所难

data.enText: She was annoyed at having three extra guests suddenly thrust on her.
data.chText: 突然又来了三位不速之客要她接待，她感到很恼火。

data.enText: the main point of an argument, a policy, etc.
data.chText: （论据、政策等的）要点，要旨，重点

data.enText: The thrust of his argument was that change was needed.
data.chText: 他的论据要点是改革是必要的。

data.enText: a sudden strong movement that pushes sth/sb forward
data.chText: 猛推；刺；戳；插

data.enText: He killed her with a thrust of the knife.
data.chText: 他把她一刀刺死了。

data.enText: the force that is produced by an engine to push a plane, rocket , etc. forward
data.chText: （发动机推动飞机、火箭等的）推力，驱动力

means: (发动机推动飞机、火箭等的)推力，驱动力
(论据、政策等的)要点，要旨，重点

ex.enText: It is impossible for only one person to propel the car up the ramp.
ex.chText: 仅凭一个人是不可能把这辆小汽车推上坡道的。

ex.enText: She was so surprised that he would give her a boat propelled by a small motor as a birthday present.
ex.chText: 她没想到他竟然送给她一艘由小马达驱动的小船作为生日礼物。

synonyms.bx: 指施加外力，尤指推力，使某人或某物前进。

ex.enText: Shoppers pushing their grocery carts crowd the supermarkets at weekends.
ex.chText: 周末，推着购物车的购物者挤满了各大超市。

ex.enText: He came back so late that he had to slowly push the door open.
ex.chText: 他回来得太晚了，不得不慢慢地把门推开。

synonyms.bx: 指用手、胳膊等使人或物移动。

ex.enText: Everyone was pushing and shoving to get a better view of the prince.
ex.chText: 大家都推搡着为一睹王子的风采抢占好位置。

ex.enText: The table wouldn't move no matter how hard he shoved.
ex.chText: 无论他怎么使劲推，桌子都纹丝不动。

synonyms.bx: 指用手或肩膀粗鲁地推挤或推撞。

ex.enText: He was beginning to get angry and thrust her roughly towards the door.
ex.chText: 他开始生气了，粗暴地把她往门口推。

ex.enText: His mother thrust an envelope into his hand and then got in the car.
ex.chText: 他妈妈把一个信封往他手里一塞就上车了。

synonyms.bx: 指突然或用力地朝某个方向推某人或某物。

data.enText: thrust sth↔aside
to refuse to listen to sb's complaints, comments, etc.
data.chText: 置之一旁；置之不理

data.enText: All our objections were thrust aside.
data.chText: 我们所有的异议都被置之不理。

data.enText: thrust sth/sb on/upon sb
to force sb to accept or deal with sth/sb that they do not want
data.chText: 把…强加于；强迫…接受；强人所难

data.enText: She was annoyed at having three extra guests suddenly thrust on her.
data.chText: 突然又来了三位不速之客要她接待，她感到很恼火。

data.enText: force/thrust/ram sth down sb's throat
to try to force sb to listen to and accept your opinions in a way that they find annoying
data.chText: 强加于人；强迫接受（观点）

data.enText: the cut and thrust (of sth)
the lively or aggressive way that sth is done
data.chText: 激烈交锋

data.enText: the cut and thrust of political debate
data.chText: 政治辩论中的唇枪舌剑

tr: the act of applying force to propel something
example: after reaching the desired velocity the drive is cut off

tr: a sharp hand gesture (resembling a blow)
example: he warned me with a jab with his finger
he made a thrusting motion with his fist

tr: a strong blow with a knife or other sharp pointed instrument
example: one strong stab to the heart killed him
he enlivened his editorials with barbed thrusts at politicians
the push of the water on the walls of the tank
the thrust of the jet engines
She forced her diet fads on him

tr: penetrate or cut through with a sharp instrument
place or put with great energy
example: She threw the blanket around the child
thrust the money in the hands of the beggar
She thrust the letter into his hand
The front of the trains that had collided head-on thrust up into the air

example.ex: They thrust him into the back of a jeep...
example.tran: 他们把他硬塞进吉普车后座。

example.ex: She grabs a stack of baby photos and thrusts them into my hands.
example.tran: 她抓起一沓婴儿照片塞到我手里。

example.ex: Two of the knife thrusts were fatal.

value.def: If you thrust something or someone somewhere, you push or move them there quickly with a lot of force.

example.ex: She thrust her way into the crowd...
He reached the garden gate and thrust his way through it.
example.tran: 他来到花园门口，挤了进去。

value.def: If you thrust your way somewhere, you move there, pushing between people or things which are in your way.

example.ex: An aerial thrust up from the grass verge...
example.tran: 一根天线在草地边上竖立着。

example.ex: A ray of sunlight thrust out through the clouds.
example.tran: 一缕阳光透过云层照射下来。

value.def: If something thrusts up or out of something else, it sticks up or sticks out in a noticeable way.

example.ex: It provides the thrust that makes the craft move forward.
example.tran: 它提供了飞机前进所需的推力。

value.def: Thrust is the power or force that is required to make a vehicle move in a particular direction.
value.tran: (车辆等的)推力，反压力，侧向压力

example.ex: The real thrust of the film is its examination of New York's Hasidic community...
example.tran: 这部电影的真正要旨是它审视了纽约的哈西德教徒。

example.ex: The main thrust of the research will be the study of the early Universe and galaxy formation...
example.tran: 此项研究的核心是早期宇宙和银河系的形成。

example.ex: The conductor brought home the full thrust of the work's emotional resolution.
example.tran: 指挥将该作品情感上的毅然决然这一主旨充分表现了出来。

value.def: The thrust of an activity or of an idea is the main or essential things it expresses.
value.tran: (活动、思想的)要点，主要内容，要旨

trans: 止推轴承；止推軸承；推力轴承；轴承；推力軸承
轴向力；轴向推力；軸向推力
推力球轴承；向心推力球轴承；推力球轴承推力球轴承；推力轴承；推力滚珠轴承
断层；逆冲断层；逆断层；冲断层；逆掩断层
使自己被注意; 出头露面
止推承座；推力瓦；推力轴承；冲掩断块
伸出式舞台；伸展式舞台；三面式舞台；伸出型舞台；伸展舞台
